devdoc.author: https://github.com/broxus
devdoc.details: Stores relays for each round, implements slashing, helps in validating TON-ETH events

params._relays: List of relay addresses to ban

params._initialRound: Initial round number. Useful in case new EVM network is connected to the bridge.
params._relays: Initial set of relays. Encode addresses as uint160

isBanned(address).details: Check if relay is banned. Ban is global. If the relay is banned it means it lost relay power in all rounds, past and future.

isRelay(uint32,address).details: Check if some address is relay at specific round

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: When Bridge paused, signature verification fails.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setRoundRelays(bytes,bytes[]).details: Grant relay permission for set of addresses at specific round

setRoundSubmitter(address).details: Can be called only by owner

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._relays: List of relay addresses to unban

updateRoundTTL(uint32).details: This affects only future rounds. Rounds, that were already set, keep their current TTL.

verifySignedTonEvent(bytes,bytes[]).details: Signatures should be sorted by the ascending signers. Error codes: 0. Verification passed (no error) 1. Specified round is less than `initialRound` 2. Specified round is more than `lastRound` 3. Not enough correct signatures. Possible reasons: - Some of the signers are not relays at the specified round - Some of the signers are banned 4. Round is rotten. 5. Everything is correct, but bridge is in "paused" state

devdoc.title: Ethereum Bridge contract

forceRoundRelays(uint160[],uint32).notice: Forced set of next round relays

recoverSignature(bytes,bytes).notice: Recover signer from the payload and signature

updateMinimumRequiredSignatures(uint32).notice: Update minimum amount of required signatures per round

updateRoundRelaysConfiguration((int8,uin.notice: Update address of configuration, that emits event with next round relays.
